statements.select:
select A.idx , A.parent_idx , A.comm_code , A.kor_nm , A.eng_nm , A.chn_nm , A.etc1_nm , A.etc2_nm , A.code_des , A.create_dt , A.create_us , A.use_fl , B.us_nm from sys_library A LEFT JOIN sys_users B ON A.create_us = B.us_idx where A.parent_idx is null
AND A.idx = #idx#
AND UPPER(A.comm_code) = UPPER(#comm_code#)
AND A.use_fl = #use_fl#

select A.idx , A.parent_idx , B.kor_nm as parent_nm , B.comm_code as parent_code , A.comm_code , A.kor_nm , A.eng_nm , A.chn_nm , A.etc1_nm , A.etc2_nm , A.code_des , A.create_dt , A.create_us , A.use_fl , C.us_nm as create_us_nm , A.ord from sys_library A LEFT JOIN sys_library B ON A.parent_idx = B.idx LEFT JOIN sys_users C ON A.create_us = C.us_idx where 1=1
AND A.parent_idx = #parent_idx#
AND A.idx = #idx#
AND A.comm_code = #comm_code#
AND B.comm_code = #parent_code#
AND UPPER(A.kor_nm) LIKE '%'|| UPPER(#kor_nm#) ||'%'
AND UPPER(C.us_nm) LIKE '%'|| UPPER(#create_us_nm#) ||'%'
AND A.use_fl = #use_fl#
order by A.ord, A.kor_nm
statements.insert:
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(idx) + 1, 1) AS idx FROM sys_library
INSERT INTO sys_library ( idx, parent_idx, comm_code, kor_nm, eng_nm , chn_nm, etc1_nm, etc2_nm, code_des, create_dt , create_us, sys_fl, ord) VALUES ( #idx#, #parent_idx#, #comm_code#, #kor_nm#, #eng_nm# , #chn_nm#, #etc1_nm#, #etc2_nm#, #code_des#, now() , #create_us#, 'N', #ord#)
statements.update:
UPDATE sys_library SET idx = #idx#
, kor_nm = #kor_nm#
, eng_nm = #eng_nm#
, chn_nm = #chn_nm#
, etc1_nm = #etc1_nm#
, etc2_nm = #etc2_nm#
, code_des = #code_des#
, use_fl = #use_fl#
, ord = #ord#
WHERE idx = #idx#
statements.select:
SELECT comm_section, comm_code, comm_value FROM sys_config WHERE 1=1
AND comm_section = #comm_section#
AND comm_code = #comm_code#
ORDER BY comm_section, comm_code
statements.update: UPDATE sys_config SET comm_value= #comm_value# WHERE comm_section=#comm_section# AND comm_code=#comm_code#
